content: this meme-inspired crochet rat is ready to feast on that scrumptiously cozy crochet pizza blanket made separately stitched in silky bernat blanket this toy is fun to make by working in a spiral using single_crochet applied details give your rat its personality use any color you want for your version and look for the pizza blanket pattern to complete the meme materials bernat® blanket™ 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m contrast a dark gray 10044 2 balls or 304 yds/278 m contrast b pink dust 10956 1 ball or 30 yds/27 m measurements approx 22½ 57 cm long x 10 25 5 cm wide
